mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grades( id, school_uuid, uuid, name, status, created_time, modified_time, type_uuid, grade_session, grade_level, type ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schoolUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeSession, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM grades WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM grades WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.school_uuid schoolUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.type_uuid typeUuid, a.grade_session gradeSession, a.grade_level gradeLevel, a.type type FROM grades a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.school_uuid schoolUuid, a.uuid uuid, a.name name, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.type_uuid typeUuid, a.grade_session gradeSession, a.grade_level gradeLevel, a.type type FROM grades a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM grades a WHERE 1=1
